title: Thrashed in train for ‘not speaking in Marathi’, Maharashtra college student kills self
description: A 19-year-old BSc student died by suicide after allegedly being harassed and assaulted on a local train for speaking Hindi. His father claims the incident, where commuters objected to his son's language, caused him extreme distress. Police have launched an investigation into the matter.

title: Morning Digest: Fire breaks out at COP30 venue in Brazil; Supreme Court opinion on Presidential Reference draws mixed reviews, and more
description: Here is a select list of stories to start the day

title: Lip-Lock legacy: Humans inherited kissing from apes; origins trace back 21mn years
description: A groundbreaking study reveals kissing predates humans by millions of years, originating with ape ancestors in prehistoric Africa. Researchers define it as non-aggressive mouth-to-mouth contact, observing it across diverse species, particularly primates. This ancient behavior, possibly practiced by Neanderthals, may have evolved for mate assessment or social bonding, offering a glimpse into our deep evolutionary past.

title: Frida Kahlo’s self-portrait sells for $54.7 million, shatters auction record for female artists
description: Some art historians have scrutinised the sale for cultural reasons, while others have raised concern that the painting — last exhibited publicly in the late 1990s — could again disappear from public view after the auction

The piece, which referenced inherited CTE in hypothetical children, has drawn condemnation from fans and health experts alike for spreading dangerous misinformation and trivializing a serious neurological condition. The article link has since been removed online.

description: Unlike traditional medicine’s one-size-fits-all approach, the field of pharmacogenomics recognises that genetic differences can dramatically alter how our bodies metabolise and respond to drugs. It represents a fundamental shift in how we think about drug therapy from treating populations to treating individuals, from reactive care to proactive prevention, from trial-and-error to precision medication

title: Delhi St Columba's School suicide case: 4 teachers suspended
description: Four teachers at St. Columba's School have been suspended following the suicide of a Class X student, Shourya Patil. The student's family alleges he was repeatedly humiliated and targeted by teachers. A suicide note found in his bag named the teachers and requested action, prompting protests and an ongoing police investigation.

Despite a packed schedule, coach Gautam Gambhir believes players should skip the IPL if workload is an issue, not international duty. Aakash Chopra agrees, emphasizing maximizing form when fit and not mentally fatigued, as Gill faces a recovery period before upcoming series.

Despite facing criticism for her opinions and public presence, she remains a strong supporter of her husband and their family.

title: India, Israel set to launch talks for free trade pact
description: India and Israel have officially launched negotiations for a free trade agreement, signing terms of reference to guide discussions. The pact aims to boost trade by removing barriers, facilitating investment, and enhancing cooperation in innovation and technology. Israel has assured India it won't seek market access in sensitive sectors like dairy and agriculture, opening new avenues for bilateral commerce.

Bazball reaches its endgame; Eng's hopes hinge on raw pace to recreate Bodyline
description: England enter the Ashes with their quickest pace attack in decades and a matured Bazball philosophy, aiming to end a 15-year drought in Australia. With Mark Wood, Jofra Archer and a battery of genuine quicks, Ben Stokes’ side arrives believing speed can break the long-standing barrier. For Bazball, this is the defining series: victory brings vindication, defeat invites its fiercest scrutiny yet.

title: Tesla's 'Nvidia moment’: Elon Musk’s answer is robots and ...
description: Tesla CEO Elon Musk believes the company's stock will see a dramatic revaluation driven by unsupervised self-driving at scale and the mass production of its Optimus humanoid robot. Musk highlighted Tesla's unique data generation for AI training and envisions Optimus addressing labor shortages and even performing surgery, potentially representing over 80% of Tesla's long-term value.

title: Jeff Bezos warns of recession: Amazon founder advises what to take off the table
description: Amazon founder Jeff Bezos is urging consumers and businesses to delay major purchases amid growing recession fears. He advises households to save for big-ticket items like cars and appliances, while small businesses should avoid large capital expenditures.  Despite this caution, Bezos remains optimistic about the long-term American Dream and future space travel accessibility.

title: Savannah James gets emotional as daughter Zhuri joins new SZN Volleyball team
description: Savannah James celebrated her daughter Zhuri Nova's milestone as she begins her volleyball journey with the popular SZN team. Despite her family's basketball background, Zhuri Nova chose a different athletic path. The proud mother shared heartwarming clips and reflected on Zhuri Nova's 11th birthday, highlighting her daughter's intelligence and confidence.

title: Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella to employees: Must rapidly rethink AI
description: Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella has appointed Rolf Harms, the executive behind the influential 2010 "Economics of the Cloud" white paper, to help rethink Microsoft's business model for the AI era. In an internal memo obtained by Business Insider, Nadella emphasized the need to rapidly transform the company's approach to AI economics, similar to its cloud computing pivot 15 years ago. The move reflects Nadella's concerns about Microsoft's survival in the AI era, as he warned employees that some of the company's biggest businesses may become irrelevant without fundamental changes.

title: Taylor Swift’s 'magical' presence leaves Travis Kelce completely speechless
description: Travis Kelce is celebrating Taylor Swift's guest appearance on his podcast, 'New Heights,' which Apple ranked as one of the top episodes of 2025. The episode, recorded before their engagement, shattered viewership records, surpassing even Kylie Kelce's previous mark. Swift shared personal insights, and Travis credits her 'magical' star power for the immense success, highlighting their significant cultural influence.
